title: Nutritional Research Data Analysis Protocol Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment using digital devices and LMS. Students learn via pre-recorded video lectures and practical modules online, followed by weekly offline sessions for case analysis and feedback.

learning_goals: Students can select appropriate data analysis methodologies and design protocols for nutrition experiments/observational studies
Students can perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) and statistical analysis on real-world nutrition datasets
Students can apply appropriate analytical techniques (e.g., regression analysis/clustering analysis) based on research questions and interpret results

resources: Virtual Dataset Package (for Nutrition Experiments/Observational Studies)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
